catalog.name: Full Load Hours
catalog.description:
This collection contains the Full Load Hours (FLH) maps expressed in MWh/MW calculated as an annual average over 30 years of data at different heights.
In particular, these elaborations derive from the new Italian anemological database consisting of 30 years of data with an hourly and spatial time step of 1.4 km, using the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) meteorological model combined with a post-processing statistic based on Analog Ensemble (AnEn).

members.name: Onshore FLH
members.description: This collection includes onshore FLH maps (MWh/MW) at heights of 50, 75 and 100 m a.g.l.

members.name: Onshore FLH at 50 m a.g.l.
members.description:
Onshore FLH at 50 m a.g.l. expressed in MWh/MW.
A Riva Calzoni ATB 500.54 wind turbine with a rotor diameter of 54 m and a nominal power of 500 kW was used to calculate the FLH value.

featureInfoTemplate.template:
FLH is equal to {{prod_50}} MWh/MW



View chart

members.name: Onshore FLH at 75 m a.g.l.
members.description:
Onshore FLH at 75 m a.g.l. expressed in MWh/MW.
The map shows for each cell the maximum FLH value among those obtained using the following wind turbines: Leitwind LTW [nominal power: 2 MW], Enercon E92 [nominal power: 2.3 MW], Vestas V90 [nominal power: 2MW] e Vestas V110 [nominal power: 2MW].

featureInfoTemplate.template:
FLH is equal to {{prod_75}} MWh/MW



View chart

members.name: Onshore FLH at 100 m a.g.l.
members.description:
Onshore FLH at 75 m a.g.l. expressed in MWh/MW.
The map shows for each cell the maximum FLH value among those obtained using the following wind turbines: Nordex N131 [nominal power: 3.6 MW], Nordex N117 [nominal power: 3.6 MW], Enercon E115 [nominal power: 3 MW], Vestas V117 [nominal power: 3.4 MW] e Vestas V136 [nominal power: 3.4MW].

featureInfoTemplate.template:
FLH is equal to {{prod_100}} MWh/MW



View chart

members.name: Offshore FLH
members.description: This collection includes offshore FLH maps (MWh/MW) at heights of 100, 125 and 150 m a.s.l.

members.name: Offshore FLH at 100 m a.s.l.
members.description:
Offshore FLH at 100 m a.s.l. expressed in MWh/MW.
An NREL_Reference wind turbine with a rotor diameter of 155 m and nominal power of 6 MW was used to calculate the FLH value.

members.description:
Offshore FLH at 125 m a.s.l. expressed in MWh/MW.
An IEA_10MW_RTW wind turbine with a rotor diameter of 198 m and nominal power of 10 MW was used to calculate the FLH value.

An IEA_15MW_RTW wind turbine with a rotor diameter of 240 m and nominal power of 15 MW was used to calculate the FLH value.
